Fri, 03 May 2024 08:00:00 +0000 Bridjid Tamihana, 27, from Huntly, inflicted injuries to every part of the toddler's body after stomping on her, punching her, and breaking her teeth, trying to drown her and stomp on her. Photo/123rf
